Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ḥry wrt ḫnrt tpy n Imn Ns-ḫnsw with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with five rows of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Condition: good but cracked at waist level
